home.title: Construction Cost Engineer

home.description: Specialized in quantity surveying, bid preparation, and project settlement. With over 7 years of experience in infrastructure, civil, and industrial construction.
home.aboutDescription: Specialized in quantity surveying, bid preparation, and project settlement. With over 7 years of experience in infrastructure, civil, and industrial construction.

about.title: About
about.subtitle: Quantity Surveying & Project Settlement Expert
about.introText1: I am a construction cost engineer with over 7 years of experience in technical infrastructure, civil works, and industrial projects. My expertise includes quantity surveying, bid preparation, project settlement, and project management.
about.introText2: I have worked with leading construction companies, participating in large-scale projects from infrastructure to high-rise buildings, and working with many major investors. With this experience, I am capable of handling complex projects, ensuring accuracy and efficiency in all aspects of the work.

portfolio.title: Portfolio
portfolio.subtitle: Projects and sample documents
portfolio.heroDescription: Explore my featured projects in quantity surveying, bid preparation, and project settlement.
